U.S. Crypto Tax Proposal Lets Miners Off the Hook, Snares ‘Some’ Decentralized Exchanges https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/08/25/us-crypto-tax-proposal-lets-miners-off-hook-snares-some-decentralized-exchanges/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines CDUDV5KYHJHINOZBHRTJYDEROM Jesse Hamilton, Nikhilesh DeThe U.S. Treasury Department has finally unveiled its definition of a "broker" for the crypto industry, defining how crypto companies and investors will need to meet tax reporting obligations and answering a years-old question over whether decentralized finance platforms and miners will need to gather their users' personal data. (Nikhilesh De/CoinDesk)
